hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:Once the Prophet (ﷺ) entered a lavatory and I placed water for his ablution. He asked, "Who placed it?" He was informed accordingly and so he said, "O Allah! Make him (Ibn `Abbas) a learned scholar in religion (Islam)

chapter.eng-name: Providing water at lavatories (for washing the private parts after answering the call of nature)
